page.title: 17Hopes for the future
page.content: Local people were asked for their hopes & wishes for the future. Some of their replies were:- ....."That local people would look after their vegetable gardens better. .....That local people would like the holiday makers more...That Clovelly was quieter...That there were more indoor facilities...For every one to live in a more peaceful world...That Clovelly stays as it is ...I could have more money...I could have my life the same all over again...The lifeboat will stay here...Clovelly had more public toilets...Clovelly stays the same but I do hope that each cottage will have a bathroom & inside toilet. ..Quicker access to motorways...Local people would travel & widen their horizons....Youngsters would be more ambitious & adventurous...For more jobs & career opportunities."
